definition: mountain/hill/anything that resembles a mountain/CL:座[zuo4]/bundled straw in which silkworms spin cocoons/gable
(bird species of China) Brandt's mountain finch (Leucosticte brandti)

sentences.english: To the west of the mountains is San Joaquin Valley, the southern half of the Central Valley.
sentences.chinese: 西面的山嶺是聖華金河谷，中央大峽谷的南半部分。

sentences.english: The Oreqen people inhabiting the mountainous areas of the Xing'an Range are often simply called the "Mountain people".
sentences.chinese: 鄂倫春族分佈在興安嶺山地，被稱爲“山嶺上人”。

sentences.english: Propaganda must be turned out about the touring of the hills surrounding the Westlake.
sentences.chinese: 西湖深度開發應在四周山嶺旅遊上做文章。

sentences.english: In this image, the mountains are covered in deep green forest.
sentences.chinese: 在這幅圖片中，山嶺爲深綠色的森林覆蓋。

sentences.english: North of these mountains lies Siberia-and Lake Baikal.
sentences.chinese: 西伯利亞和貝加爾湖就位於這些山嶺的北方。

sentences.english: Along both banks of the river, there are the busiest sections downtown and green wooded mountains. That is Nanming District.
sentences.chinese: 河流兩旁繁華的鬧市和青翠的山嶺就是南明區。

sentences.english: And I will make all my mountains a way, and my paths shall be exalted.
sentences.chinese: 我要使我的一切山嶺變爲大路，並把我的街道修高。

sentences.english: It is the common disease in the high-speed highway engineering of mountainous areas that the roadbed comes down.
sentences.chinese: 路基滑坡是山嶺重丘區高速公路工程中常見的病害。
山嶺在殘陽的燃燒中走向夜晚。

sentences.english: It is to enter hill to search dragon above all, be in winding in fluctuant numerous mountain ridge.
sentences.chinese: 是首先入山尋龍，在蜿蜒起伏的衆多山嶺中。

sentences.english: Thou didst cover it with the deep as with a vesture; the waters stood above the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 禰用深淵摭蓋地面，猶如衣裳，諸水高過山嶺。

sentences.english: As on a dawn-illumined mountain stood.
sentences.chinese: 彷彿破曉的陽光輻照山嶺。

sentences.english: Let the wind of life, but also a peak of green mountains, indomitable spirit.
sentences.chinese: 讓生命的風，還山嶺一峯青翠，頂天立地。

sentences.english: And disappeared when the mountain is, like the fog around the cloud cover in general, in the blue-colored horizon.
sentences.chinese: 時隱時現的山嶺，象雲遮霧繞一般，在湛藍色的天邊。

sentences.english: Fifteen cubits upward did the waters prevail； and the mountains were covered.
sentences.chinese: 水勢比山高過十五肘，山嶺都淹沒了。

sentences.english: To get through hills and mountains, to secure a bright future.
sentences.chinese: 越過山仔越過山嶺，就有光明的前途。

definition: continuous/unbroken/uninterrupted/extending forever into the distance (of mountain range, river etc)
continuous (esp. of mountain ranges)/to stretch long and unbroken/a continuous link/sostenuto (sustained, in music)
no sign of human habitation (idiom); desolate
strategically situated and easy to defend/strategic location
